oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Phil Harris Day - Part 1 - 1951-07-28
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First recording is part 2 of a late 1953 broadcast of WSM's Junior Grand Ole Opry show hosted by Louie Buck with guest Carl Smith. Second recording is part 1 of a recording titled Phil Harris Day, featuring Phil Harris (host/performer) and David Cobb (announcer) on July 28, 1951 located at Sulpher Dell Park in Nashville, Tenn.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Phil Harris; Carl Smith; Bernie Wing; Francis Lyles; Mike Roberts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Louie Buck and Carl Smith talk -- Hey Joe (Carl Smith) -- Louie Buck introduces Bernie Wing -- I'm Walking Behind You (Bernie Wing) -- Louie Buck introduces Francis Lyles -- Goo Goo Cluster commercial (Ott Devine) -- Louie Buck introduces Mike Roberts -- St Louis Blues (Mike Roberts) -- Louie Buck recaps the contestants -- Theme -- Announcer closing statement -- David Cobb talks about Phil Harris and introduces Phil Harris -- Phil Harris talks -- Possibilities (Phil Harris) -- The Preacher And The Bear (Phil Harris) -- [Unidentified tune] [continued on part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Junior grand ole opry (Radio program); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Cobb, David (Announcer); Harris, Phil, 1904-1995;
